```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):
    page.title = "Flet counter example"
    page.vertical_alignment = ft.MainAxisAlignment.CENTER

    txt_number = ft.TextField(value="0", text_align=ft.TextAlign.RIGHT, width=100)

    def minus_click(e):
        txt_number.value = str(int(txt_number.value) - 1)
        page.update()

    def plus_click(e):
        txt_number.value = str(int(txt_number.value) + 1)
        page.update()

    page.add(
        ft.Row(
            [
                ft.IconButton(ft.icons.REMOVE, on_click=minus_click),
                txt_number,
                ft.IconButton(ft.icons.ADD, on_click=plus_click),
            ],
            alignment=ft.MainAxisAlignment.CENTER,
        )
    )

ft.app(target=main)
```

```python
def minus_click(e):
        txt_number.value = str(int(txt_number.value) - 1)
        if int(txt_number.value) < 0:
            txt_number.value = "0"
        page.update()
```

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):
    def add_numbers(e):
        result.value = int(num1.value) + int(num2.value)
        result.update()

    num1 = ft.TextField(label="Êï∞Â≠ó1")
    num2 = ft.TextField(label="Êï∞Â≠ó2")
    num_row = ft.Row(controls=[num1, num2])

    add_button = ft.FilledButton(text="ADD", on_click=add_numbers)
    result = ft.Text()

    page.add(num_row, add_button, result)

ft.app(target=main)
```

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):
    # page.horizontal_alignment=ft.CrossAxisAlignment.CENTER

    # „ÉÜ„Ç≠„Çπ„Éà„Ç≥„É≥„Éà„É≠„Éº„É´„Çí‰ΩúÊàê
    text_control = ft.Text(value="", size=35)

    # „Éú„Çø„É≥„ÅåÊäº„Åï„Çå„ÅüÊôÇ„ÅÆ„Ç§„Éô„É≥„Éà„Éè„É≥„Éâ„É©
    def button_clicked(e):
        button_name = e.control.text
        text_control.value = button_name + "„ÅåÊäº„Åï„Çå„Åæ„Åó„Åü"
        text_control.update()

    # „Éú„Çø„É≥„Çí‰ΩúÊàê
    button1 = ft.FilledButton(text="„Éú„Çø„É≥1", on_click=button_clicked)
    button2 = ft.FilledButton(text="„Éú„Çø„É≥B", on_click=button_clicked)
    button3 = ft.FilledButton(text="„Éú„Çø„É≥‚Ö¢", on_click=button_clicked)

    # „Éú„Çø„É≥„ÇíÊ®™‰∏¶„Å≥„Å´ÈÖçÁΩÆ
    button_row = ft.Row(
        controls=[button1, button2, button3],
        alignment=ft.MainAxisAlignment.CENTER
    )

    main_container = ft.Container(
        content=ft.Column(
            controls=[
                button_row,
                text_control,
            ],
            horizontal_alignment=ft.CrossAxisAlignment.CENTER
        ),
        height=250,
        padding=20,
        border=ft.border.all(2, ft.colors.BLACK),
    )

    # „Éö„Éº„Ç∏„Å´Ë¶ÅÁ¥†„ÇíËøΩÂä†
    page.add(main_container)

# Flet„Ç¢„Éó„É™„ÇíÂÆüË°å
ft.app(target=main)
```
